testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.RoomContextMenu_Notification
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User logged in successfully...

Scenario 07: Verify Roomcontextmenu tab Notification Option Expand a Cabinet Expand a Drawer select a Folder Notification dialog should be open Click on reset button Reset option verified successfully...
